titleStmt.title: An auncient historie and exquisite chronicle of the Romanes warres, both ciuile and foren written in Greeke by the noble orator and historiographer, Appian of Alexandria ... ; with a continuation, bicause [sic] that parte of Appian is not extant, from the death of Sextus Pompeius, second sonne to Pompey the Great, till the overthrow of Antonie and Cleopatra ...
Historia Romana. English. 1578
titleStmt.author: Appianus, of Alexandria.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Balliol College (University of Oxford. Library.
Includes bibliographical references, in marginal notes, and indexes.
